1.0.name: wordpress/contact-info-options
1.0.description: Contact Info Options is a simple WordPress plugin that modifies the contact info fields in the user profile. The plugin gives you the option to disable unused instant messager fields (AIM, Yahoo IM and Jabber/Google Talk) and/or to add additional fields, currently social networking (Twitter, Facebook and Google+) and ScienceCard.
